text: Then King Ahaz commanded Urijah the priest, saying, "On the great  new  altar burn the morning burnt offering, the evening grain offering, the kingâ€™s burnt sacrifice, and his grain offering, with the burnt offering of all the people of the land, their grain offering, and their drink offerings; and sprinkle on it all the blood of the burnt offering and all the blood of the sacrifice. And the bronze altar shall be for me to inquire  by ."
